Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.GUI

Class ClientGUIController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.GUI.ClientGUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class ClientGUIController extends Object implements View

It is the Controller of the GUI

It acts on the GUI using the Platform method runLater, which refreshes the GUI
